title: The Album Cover Game
content:
I came across this terrific game on another forum I frequent. Here's the procedure as given [there](http://web.archive.org/web/20110109021709/http:/forums.xkcd.com/viewtopic.php?f=14&t=16834&start=0):

1 - Go to wikipedia. Hit "random".  
 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random](http://web.archive.org/web/20110109021709/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)  
The first random wikipedia article you get is the name of your band.

2 - Go to Random quotations:  
 [http://www.quotationspage.com/random.php3](http://web.archive.org/web/20110109021709/http:/www.quotationspage.com/random.php3)  
The last four or five words of the very last quote of the page is the title of your first album.

3 - Go to flickr and click on "explore the last seven days"  
 [http://www.flickr.com/explore/interesting/7days/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110109021709/http:/www.flickr.com/explore/interesting/7days/)  
Third picture, no matter what it is ((SFW of course)), will be your album cover.

4 - Use photoshop or similar to mix it all up. Host it and bring it here.

I bet you all can come up with some spectacular ones. Here are a few that I've already done:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110109021709im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled_4571.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110109021709im_/http:/typophile.com/files/New%20Freedom_6079.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110109021709im_/http:/typophile.com/files/WRONG_3637.png)
